Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の作った塔に住む聖獣なんて、 なんかちょっとパッとしないわね。
Entry.EnglishText: A Sacred Beast living in a tower built by <Yellow>Humans<White> is somewhat lackluster.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに……聖獣を祀るために その塔を建てたとも考えられるが……
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed... I think that the tower could have been built to enshrine the Sacred Beast, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだな、きっと住むところがなくて、 建ててもらったのさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I'm sure that since it didn't have a place to live, they built the tower for it!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたって、よく次から次へと そういう事、思いつくわね……
Entry.EnglishText: I swear, you're always coming up with one thing after the other...

Entry.JapaneseText: 絶対に、あんたはクチから先に 生まれたと思うわ……
Entry.EnglishText: There's no doubt in my mind that you were born talking...
